elements.name: Test the Remove button functionality

steps.name: open web login page
user inputs username "standard_user"
user inputs password "secret_sauce"
user clicks login button
user will see the cart icon in the homepage
user adds items to cart
verify that the items in the cart matches "1"
user will click on the cart icon
user will see the order details page
user will click the Remove button
the order detail of the product will disappear

user will be directed to the product display page

elements.name: Test the Continue button functionality

steps.name: open web login page
user inputs username "standard_user"
user inputs password "secret_sauce"
user clicks login button
user will see the cart icon in the homepage
user adds items to cart
verify that the items in the cart matches "1"
user will click on the cart icon
user will see the order details page
user will click the Checkout button
user will be directed to fill in their data
user will fill in "Vitri" in first name
user will fill in "Lukito" in last name
user will fill in "12345" in zip code
user will click the Continue button
user will be directed to the order confirmation page

user will click the Checkout button
user will be directed to fill in their data

user will fill in "" in last name

user will fill in "Lukito" in last name
